title: Council Directive 75/269/EEC of 28 April 1975 concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive No 75/268/EEC (Belgium)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 28 April 1975  concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive No 75/268/EEC (Belgium)  (75/269/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The area situated in the Kingdom of Belgium which appears in the Annex is part of the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Article 3 (4) of Directive No 75/268/EEC.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 April 1975.
For the Council
The President
M.A. CLINTON  (1)See page 1 of this Official Journal. (2)OJ No C 62, 15.3.1975, p. 19.
